welcome.title: Welcome to the GCWCC Quiz Game
welcome.message: Get ready to test your knowledge! Get a question right, and you'll earn points according to its difficulty. Get it wrong, and you'll lose points! Try to get the best score possible. When you're ready, set up your game configuration below, and select the Start Game button. Good Luck!

modal.title: Options
modal.paragraph: You can reset the game with the same configuration, or go back to the main menu to adjust the configuration.
